title: Xbox Showcase: Everything You Need to Know - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.28.20
description:
The Kinda Funny Xcast Host SnowBikeMike joins Greg, Tim, Blessing, and Andy to wrap-up all their thoughts on the HUGE Xbox Showcase.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Remember, it’s a huge Xbox week here on Kinda Funny:
TODAY at 2 pm, Greg’s streaming the Summer Game Fest Demo Event -- he’ll be playing a bunch of the demos on Xbox LIVE. Come tell him what to play.
Thursday at 9 am, we’re reacting LIVE to the Xbox Games Showcase alongside the Xcast host SnowBikeMike.
Andrea doing official Twitch Gaming PostShow
Thursday afternoon, Greg’s first playthrough of Halo: Combat Evolved starts with Tim and Andy on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Saturday, it’s the second episode of the Xcast with SnowBikeMike, Gary, and Alanah!
Our Ghost of Tsushima Spoilercast with Sucker Punch’s Nate Fox is live as a Kinda Funny Gamescast!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:00 -  Xbox Post-Show Recap
01:18:15 -  KLARNA
01:19:20 - Out today
01:21:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Greg
